attributes.action: Allow UK Nationals resident in countries flagged with the red list to isolate.
attributes.additional_details: Consider a means for vaccinated UK nationals working abroad to travel back to the UK and isolate on arrival with family.
attributes.background:
At the moment UK nationals holding residence visas in red-list countries are unable to visit families and loved ones without undergoing forced quarantine. 

Many have proof of vaccination and take far more precautions, especially when travelling and with limited leave available.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign these petitions calling for a similar action: 

Allow fully vaccinated people coming from red list countries to isolate at home
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/588072

Allow ALL vaccinated British Expats to visit the UK without quarantining
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/585438

Scrap quarantine for vaccinated people arriving in the UK
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/575612
